tool_description: Generates alerts and notifications when system parameters exceed defined thresholds or anomalous conditions are detected.

alert_level.description: Alert severity level: info, warning, critical, emergency

metric_name.description: Name of the metric being monitored

current_value.description: Current value of the monitored metric

threshold_value.description: Threshold value that triggered the alert

condition_type.description: Threshold condition: above, below, equal, not_equal

error_messages: Invalid alert level: Use one of: info, warning, critical, emergency.
Invalid condition type: Use one of: above, below, equal, not_equal.
Missing system configuration: The specified system_id is not configured for alerting.
Invalid threshold comparison: current_value and threshold_value must be valid numbers for comparison.
usage: Specify the system, alert level, metric details, and threshold condition. The tool generates appropriate alerts with timestamps and severity classification.

alert_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated alert

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when alert was generated
